name: Sites Link Bar
description: This block represents a list of links to be rendered on a page

elements.helpText: This element controls the actual list of links for this link bar.
elements.label: Links

elements.helpText: This element controls the text styling for this link bar.
elements.label: Text Style

elements.helpText: This element controls the background color for this link bar.
elements.label: Background Color

elements.helpText: This element controls the alignment defintion for this link bar.
elements.label: Alignment

elements.helpText: This element controls the spacing between links.
elements.label: Spacing between links

elements.helpText: This element controls the padding values for this link bar.
elements.label: Padding
Vertical Rule
elements.helpText: This element controls the vertical rules to be used by this link bar.
This element controls the common settings for this link bar.
elements.label: Common Settings

elements.helpText: This element is used to uniquely identify this element in the current content item
elements.label: Key
